anya-e1211n0:10_0: Bho buddhā tumhepi kho maṃ pāletha.
anya-e1211n0:21_0: Buddhassa bhagavato iddhi kiṃ na kare
anya-e1211n0:69_0: Bho guṇavaṃ purisa tvampi dānaṃ dehi
anya-e1211n0:70_0: Bho guṇavanto purisā tumhe dānaṃ detha
anya-e1211n0:89_0: Bho gacchaṃ yaññadatta tvaṃ maṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n0:191_0: Jantumpetaṃ kaṭaṃ kāremi teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n0:192_0: Jantupete kaṭaṃ kārema teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n0:195_0: Jantunā riyena yo koci sukhaṃ pāpuṇati
anya-e1211n0:196_0: Jantūhi ariyehi ye keci sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n0:209_0: Bho satthā tvaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n0:223_0: Satthari dhammarāje ko bhattiṃ na ghaṭīyati
anya-e1211n0:408_0: Bho yāgu tvaṃ pana khudaṃ bhana
anya-e1211n0:428_0: Bho mātā tvaṃ pana ciraṃ jīva
anya-e1211n0:454_0: Jambuyā kho pana yo koci jīvati
anya-e1211n0:455_0: Jambūhi kho pana ye keci jīvanti
anya-e1211n0:520_0: Guṇavatā kulamhā na apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n0:521_0: Guṇavantehi kulehi na apenti ye keci
anya-e1211n0:530_0: Bho gacchaṃ guṇavaṃ tvaṃ pana sugatiṃ gacchāhi
anya-e1211n0:550_0: Bho aṭṭhi saṅkhalikaṃ tvaṃ aniccato passa
anya-e1211n0:554_0: Aṭṭhinā kāyena yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n0:555_0: Aṭṭhīhi kāyehi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n0:570_0: Bho daṇḍī tvaṃ pana kammaṃ karohi
anya-e1211n0:584_0: Daṇḍini pana me mano na ramati
anya-e1211n0:585_0: Daṇḍīsu kho pana me manā na ramanti.
anya-e1211n0:590_0: Bho āyu tvaṃ pana jīvitaṃ pālehi
anya-e1211n0:604_0: Āyūmhi kho pana manaṃ patiṭhitaṃ sabbadā
anya-e1211n0:605_0: Āyūsu kho pana manaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ sabbadā.
anya-e1211n0:611_0: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e1211n0:616_0: Kānici pana saheva etesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ idaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:622_0: Bho sabbā bhuta kalyāṇaṃ karohi kusalā sadā;
anya-e1211n0:623_0: Bho sabbe purisā bhaddaṃ karotha kusalaṃ sadā.
anya-e1211n0:625_0: Sabbe bhojāpayī te tu sā nakhīyittha bhojanaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:636_0: Sabbasmiṃ buddhadhamme ca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n0:637_0: Sabbesu ca vihāresu thūpe kāresi khattiyoti.
anya-e1211n0:640_0: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṅkā therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e1211n0:641_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṃ khitaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:642_0: Bho sabbe ca paje tvampi dānaṃ dadāhi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n0:643_0: Bho sabbāyo pajā tumhe sīlaṃ rakkhatha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n0:645_0: Sabbāyo diṭṭhiyo hantvā khemaṃ gacchanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1211n0:646_0: Sabbassā assu kaññāya niccaṃ kammaṃ karīyyate;
anya-e1211n0:649_0: Sabbāhi ca nadīheva khettaṃ vapati kassako.
anya-e1211n0:650_0: Sabbassā assu kaññāya cittaṃ nadeti paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n0:652_0: Sabbassā pana taṇhāya vimuttassa natthi bhayaṃ;
anya-e1211n0:655_0: Sabbāsaṃ pana gaṅgānaṃ mahogho hoti sabbadā.
anya-e1211n0:656_0: Sabbassā neva kaññāya cittaṃ ramati paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n0:657_0: Sabbāsu ceva gaṅgāsu macchā caranti sabbadāti.
anya-e1211n0:662_0: Bho sabbā bhūta kalyāṇaṃ puññaṃ karohi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n0:663_0: Bho sabbānica bhūtāni puññaṃ karotha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n0:664_0: Sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ samādāya pāraṃ tiṇṇosi brāhmaṇo;
anya-e1211n0:665_0: Sabbāni assu puññāni katvāna tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e1211n0:676_0: Sabbasmiṃ puññakammeca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n0:700_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññā bahuṃ puññaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n0:701_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n0:702_0: Bho pubbe kaññe bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n0:703_0: Bho pubbā kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n0:704_0: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci kaññaṃ puññaṃ kārāpayī
anya-e1211n0:705_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo puññe kārāpayī
anya-e1211n0:706_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya puññaṃ kataṃ
anya-e1211n0:707_0: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi puññāni katāni
anya-e1211n0:708_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci anucarī
anya-e1211n0:709_0: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi keci anucariṃsu
anya-e1211n0:710_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya ābharaṇaṃ adadī
anya-e1211n0:712_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci puriso apeto.
anya-e1211n0:713_0: Pubbāhi yāya kāhici kaññāhi keci purisā apetā
anya-e1211n0:714_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya mātāpitaro ahesuṃ
anya-e1211n0:716_0: Pubbāyaṃ yāya kāyaci kaññāyaṃ cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n0:717_0: Pubbāsu yāsu kāsuci kaññāsu cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:720_0: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci pana bahuṃ puccaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n0:721_0: Pubbāni yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n0:722_0: Bho pubba bhūta tvaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n0:723_0: Bho pubbāni bhūtāni bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n0:724_0: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci puññaṃ kārāpayī ekacco
anya-e1211n0:725_0: Pubbāni yāni kānici puññe kārāpayiṃsu ekacce
anya-e1211n0:752_0: Ekassa garuno kho pana parikkhāro hoti
anya-e1211n0:753_0: Ekesaṃ garūnaṃ kho pana guṇaghoso hoti
anya-e1211n0:758_0: Ekā kaññā pana devadattaṃ kambalaṃ yācate
anya-e1211n0:776_0: Ekaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:794_0: Yo koci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti
anya-e1211n0:795_0: Ye keci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpenti
anya-e1211n0:796_0: Yaṃ kiṃci dāsaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n0:797_0: Ye keci dāse gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n0:802_0: Yassa kassaci dānaṃ deti saddho sappuriso
anya-e1211n0:812_0: Yā kāci vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n0:813_0: Yā kāci vanitāyo dāsī kamme kārāpenti
anya-e1211n0:814_0: Yaṃ kiṃci vanitaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti puriso
anya-e1211n0:815_0: Yā kāci vanitāyo puññaṃ kārenti purisā
anya-e1211n0:816_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpīyate
anya-e1211n0:817_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpito
anya-e1211n0:818_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti sāmiko
anya-e1211n0:819_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti sāmikā
anya-e1211n0:820_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n0:821_0: Yāsaṃ kāsaṃci vanitānaṃ ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n0:822_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n0:823_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n0:826_0: Yāyaṃ kāyaṃci vanitāyaṃ me cittaṃ na ramati
anya-e1211n0:827_0: Yāsu kāsuci vanitāsu me cittāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n0:830_0: Yaṃ kiṃci kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:831_0: Yāni kānici kulāni bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n0:832_0: Yaṃ kiṃci bahuṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti koci
anya-e1211n0:833_0: Yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ kārenti keci
anya-e1211n0:863_0: Tesu bhikkhūsu pana me mano ramati.
anya-e1211n0:866_0: Sā khattiyakaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:880_0: Tāyaṃ khattiya kaññāyaṃ pasīdati yo koci
anya-e1211n0:884_0: Taṃ kulaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:885_0: Tāni kulāni pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n0:886_0: Taṃ kulaṃ uddissa puññaṃ karoti koci
anya-e1211n0:887_0: Tāni kulāni uddissa puññāni karonti keci
anya-e1211n0:902_0: Eso sisso ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchati
anya-e1211n0:903_0: Ete sissā ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchanti
anya-e1211n0:920_0: Esā vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e1211n0:930_0: Etāya vanitāya pana yo koci apeti
anya-e1211n0:931_0: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
anya-e1211n0:938_0: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:940_0: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana passati yo koci
anya-e1211n0:941_0: Etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci
anya-e1211n0:944_0: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti
anya-e1211n0:945_0: Etehi kulehi pana janā sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n0:946_0: Etassa kulassa kho pana dhanaṃ dadāti dhanavā
anya-e1211n0:947_0: Etesaṃ kulānaṃ pana dhanaṃ dadanti dhanavantā
anya-e1211n0:948_0: Etasmā kulamhā kho pana ekacco na apeti
anya-e1211n0:949_0: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
anya-e1211n0:952_0: Etasmiṃ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
anya-e1211n0:953_0: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n0:956_0: Ayaṃ jano pana taṃ purisaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n0:957_0: Ime janā te purise puññaṃ kārāpenti
anya-e1211n0:974_0: Ayaṃ kaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:984_0: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n0:985_0: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n0:992_0: Imaṃ cittaṃ pana attano santānaṃ vijānāti
anya-e1211n0:1000_0: Imassa cittassa ovādaṃ deti yo koci
anya-e1211n0:1001_0: Imesaṃ cittānaṃ ovādaṃ denti ye keci
anya-e1211n0:1010_0: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ toseti
anya-e1211n0:1016_0: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n0:1017_0: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n0:1024_0: Amusmiṃ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati
anya-e1211n0:1025_0: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n0:1028_0: Asu upāsikā pana sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti
anya-e1211n0:1034_0: Amuyā upāsikāya yo koci pana sucarati
anya-e1211n0:1035_0: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana sucaranti
anya-e1211n0:1039_0: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana apenti
anya-e1211n0:1043_0: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n0:1046_0: Aduṃ dhanavaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n0:1064_0: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṃ kodhassa gacchati;
anya-e1211n0:1065_0: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
anya-e1211n0:1066_0: Kaṃsi tvaṃ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
anya-e1211n0:1067_0: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n0:1068_0: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto kuvaṃ sattassa kārako;
anya-e1211n0:1069_0: Kehidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
anya-e1211n0:1070_0: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
anya-e1211n0:1071_0: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṃ rakkhanti devatā.
anya-e1211n0:1073_0: Kesaṃ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
anya-e1211n0:1075_0: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:1076_0: Kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāya vācaṃ bhasayi īdisaṃ;
anya-e1211n0:1078_0: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
anya-e1211n0:1082_0: Kā ca suphassayaṃ dānaṃ mañcapīṭhādikaṃ adā;
anya-e1211n0:1083_0: Kāyo nānāvidhaṃ puññaṃ katvāna tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n0:1084_0: Kaṃ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṃ sīlaṃ paripālayī;
anya-e1211n0:1085_0: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
anya-e1211n0:1086_0: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
anya-e1211n0:1087_0: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
anya-e1211n0:1088_0: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṃ sukhaṃ;
anya-e1211n0:1089_0: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:1093_0: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
anya-e1211n0:1094_0: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;
anya-e1211n0:1095_0: Kāsaṃ kho pana kaññānaṃ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
anya-e1211n0:1096_0: Kassaṃ nadiṃ pana macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā;
anya-e1211n0:1097_0: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā.
anya-e1211n0:1100_0: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
anya-e1211n0:1101_0: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṃ jānema taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:1102_0: Kiṃ tvaṃ attavasaṃ disvā mama dajjāsimaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1211n0:1103_0: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n0:1106_0: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṃ kannu yocasi;
anya-e1211n0:1107_0: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṃ saddho yajati gotamaṃ.
anya-e1211n0:1108_0: Kassa so kayirā mettiṃ tamāhu cariyaṃ budhā;
anya-e1211n0:1110_0: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ iti rājā apucchitaṃ;
anya-e1211n0:1111_0: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.
anya-e1211n0:1114_0: Kasmiṃ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e1211n0:1115_0: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṃ so sakhāhitoti.
anya-e1211n0:1164_0: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṃ uppajjati
anya-e1211n0:1168_0: Tayi citte kho pana kusalacittaṃ patiṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n0:1238_0: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;
anya-e1211n0:1239_0: Tato nāmikapantīsu natū vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e1211n0:1241_0: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.
anya-e1211n0:1242_0: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e1211n0:1243_0: Te me saddoti viññeyyo viññunā nayadassināti.
anya-e1211n0:1606_0: Dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā sataṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n0:1609_0: Taṃ lakkhanti vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā dasasatasahassaṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n0:1623_0: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṃ rathā
anya-e1211n0:1624_0: Rathe rathe sataṃ assā asse asse sataṃ narā
anya-e1211n0:1625_0: Nare nare sataṃ kaññā eke kissaṃ satitthiyo
anya-e1211n0:1631_0: Kamo kaccāyane eso pāliyā so virujjhati
